name: Unchosen (Prototype)
description:
Prototype for a 2D-top down adventure done during the "Game Make Online" course at Futuregames 2019/2020.

There is some unfinished graphics and stuff..but it works for now.

Keyboard:

• W - Up

• S - Down

• A - Left

• D - Right

• Shift - Attack

• E - Interact (Talking, activating, giving items)

• Space – Dodge

• Escape – Restart

Game Game Pad:

• D - Pad for movement

• X - Attack

• B - Interact (Talking, activating, giving items)

• A - Dodge
